facts: Mrs. Catherine's child, born from her relationship with Count Maximilian and sent away to be nursed, is encountered by Captain Wood and Ensign Macshane seven years later as Thomas Billings.

Chapter 6 reveals that seven years later, Mrs. Catherine, now married to John Hayes, wants to see her child. In the same chapter, Captain Wood and Ensign Macshane encounter Thomas Billings, who is identified as Mrs. Hayes' son.

- Relationship: Central element (Mrs. Catherine's child)
